/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall apartment buildings, their white facades gleaming under the clear blue sky. Cars of various colors are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
